name: aws-lambda-bootstrap
description: Single base code lambda to handle several event types

scripts.build: babel src --out-dir index && cp package.json index
scripts.postbuild: npm run zip && npm run move-to-build
scripts.move-to-build: mkdir build && mv index index.zip build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:upload
scripts.upload-and-test: npm run deploy && npm run invoke && cat build/invoke_output.txt
